feed.title: Habitica Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.33.1 Promotion Date Revisions
entry.content:
API

  • Chore: Minor revisions to timing of gifting and Gem discount promos (@SabreCat)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.33.2 More Wiki Link Fixes
entry.content:
API

  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

Client

  • Fix: Several more links to outdated Fandom wiki replaced or removed (@SabreCat)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.33.3 Fixes
entry.content:
Server

  • Feature: Add SLOW_REQUEST_THRESHOLD env option to send activity that drags past the given processing time to logger service (@phillipthelen)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

Client

  • Feature: Upgrade Enchanted Armoire icon to animated, componentized sprite (@phillipthelen)
  • Fix: NPC and Kickstarter achievements display correctly in admin panel (@phillipthelen)
  • Fix: Use correct permissions.news flag for determining whether to show news drafts (@phillipthelen)

entry.title: New release for Habitica:
entry.content:
API

  • Feature: It is now permitted to like your own chat messages (@negue)
  • Feature: Local and destination private message documents are now associated using a unique ID (@negue)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Feature: Substantial revision to look and feel of chat and private messaging (@negue)

Repo

  • Fix: Remove redundant GitHub Actions on branches by staff (@phillipthelen)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.34.2 Hotfixes
entry.content:
API

  • Fix: Restore translation of system chat messages (@phillipthelen)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Refactor: Adapt image display in notifications to Sprite component (@phillipthelen)
